attributes.action: Umbrella payroll companies should be regulated or abolished.
attributes.additional_details:
Umbrella companies have been taking unregulated amounts of fees off of workers across the UK.

Putting more pressure on agency and temporary workers. 

This needs to be considered for regulation or abolishment to help the emotional and financial well-being of adults in the UK.
attributes.background: Umbrella payroll companies have somehow found a way of taking more money off of the working classes be it in teaching, construction and so on.
